channel.title: [PI] Clipped Npcs Fatal Exception
channel.description:
Followed this: [url=http://rune-serber.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/386960-pi-npc-clipping.html]http://google.com/runescape-development/google/tutorials/386960-pi-npc-clipping.html[/url]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/4t3cxi.png[/img]
Npchandler 2362: [CODE]} else if( npc.moveY == 1) {[/CODE]
Npchandler 2308: [CODE]handleClipping(i);[/CODE]
Get this at Barrows, when you move away from them.
Someone said it has to do with the height being -1, but I don't really understand.
